content.title: Substance Use Disorders
content.definition: Problematic pattern of substance use causing impairment
key_points: Core concept of Substance Use Disorders
Essential understanding of Substance Use Disorders
Clinical/practical relevance of Substance Use Disorders
clinical_pearls: Important consideration for Substance Use Disorders
examples: Example application of Substance Use Disorders
content.statement: Substance Use Disorders is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Psychiatry that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Substance Use Disorders helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Substance Use Disorders include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Substance Use Disorders.
